items.title: Invoice and billing  management
content: Generate invoices automatically when buyers make purchases. Gather billings from multiple sales channels into one single system.
Monitor the status of invoices (draft, posted, canceled) in real time.
Generate invoices in different currencies to cater to international clients.

items.title: Transaction management
content: Integrate with various payment gateways (e.g., e-wallet, credit card, bank credit, etc.) to facilitate seamless transactions.
Maintain a real-time detailed log of all transactions, including dates, amounts, payment methods, and statuses.

items.title: Pricing model
content: Define and organize different pricing types for products or services, including service fees, shipping fees, and other charges, catering to all pricing models of merchants.

items.title: Payment provider setting
content: Manage multiple payment providers so that merchants can keep track of all cash flow from several sources.
Provide reports or charts to visualize revenue, and accounting activities with real-time insights.

items.title: Income and outcome management
content: Manage income and outcome of all payment providers. Offer real-time transaction history for transparency.

items.title: Warehouse management
content: Automatically generate invoices when orders are fulfilled and shipped from the warehouse, ensuring timely billing and payment.
Link orders to invoices, allowing both warehouse and finance teams to track the status of orders and payments in real time.

items.title: Omnichannel selling
content: Centralize orders bills from multiple sales channels (e-commerce platforms, physical stores, marketplaces) into a single system, ensuring consistency and reducing the risk of errors.
Apply transaction fees, commissions, and service charges dynamically.

items.title: Purchase order
content: Generate invoices directly from approved purchase orders.
Ensure invoices are verified before processing payments.

items.title: Cross-border shipping
content: Sync shipping invoices from multiple carriers into one platform.
Handle transactions across different currencies with automatic exchange rate updates.
